website_summaries.verdict: The bulky Turcom AcoustoShock Tough speaker delivers a solid Bluetooth audio experience in an outdoor-friendly package.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich, thumping bass and crisp highs
cons: Rather large and heavy for a portable speaker
Can distort on deep bass tracks at top volumes

customer_reviews.title: Beast!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beast..this thing is rather big and heavy..just check the specs..not for clipping on a backpack etc..perfect for job site or outdoor Yardwork... I love it.. had it connected to my phone about 2 minutes after grabbing it off my porch..it rocks my entire back yard...had it playing all day at work while it charged my phone to full capacity..
customer_reviews.author: w. watty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker. It autoconects to the paired device (in ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker. It autoconects to the paired device (in this case my smartphone), and if you've got a music player which autoplays your music from where you left off, then you save yourself the hassle of opening up your music player. It's great for indoor use (loud volume for a small gathering of friends having drinks at the table) and it's acceptable for outdoor use (you can hear it while bbqing but it's not as good as when inside). All and all it's a great speaker. And taking into consideration the price, it's an excellent portable bt speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ma C.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Rugged, durable, handy for charging in a pinch. Poor sound at first, it needed a break-in just like the old school speakers did. Not recommended for using with the auxiliary input, doesn't seem to be able to handle the extra power you can give it that way. Via bluetooth it sounds much better, good for outside while doing yard work. etc.
customer_reviews.author: AmznShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's badass. We've taken it on river floats where it's getting wet non stop, pool side getting splashed, and in the shower and it's never had a problem! The speaker can get really loud and sounds great with the bass in the back. The only annoying thing is the buttons on top are super touchy. Be careful not to put anything on top of it or it can press the bottons and possibly change things.
customer_reviews.author: Jeena

customer_reviews.title: OK experience with Turcom AcoustoShock
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wireless speaker at the end of November and the unit is no longer working. It always had issues pairing to bluetooth devices and now it's non operational. Three months of bad pairing and then kaput!! Upon further investigation, the charger isn't working. I had to purchase another and it's charging up. Still having problem with bluetooth pairing. It won't automatically pair with a device but I can manually pair it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell G.

customer_reviews.title: This thing will crank the tunes pretty well. Works great in my workshop
customer_reviews.text: This thing will crank the tunes pretty well. Works great in my workshop. Wood dust was my biggest concern, and this thing has no problem with it. I am pleased with the sound. I had an old ipod, got my music on there, this keeps it charged at the same time. I did sync with my iphone, no problems, played fine, ipod just more convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Product is beyond expectation. Very good speaker. Excellent bass. Very good volume and sound quality. Beatiful. The rubber fit perfect. Battery is very good and lasts more then I expected. Very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Petrone

customer_reviews.title: Highly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I just received my turcom wireless speaker yesterday This was a great choice. The quality of the speaker, is outstanding. The sound of the speaker is the same, if not better than Bose. The sound also has to do with the source it is coming from. I will write another review in about a month of good use.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase this Year
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases this year. This delivers what it promises: Loud, clear, quality sound at an excellent price point. The sound belies its size. I'm listening to Holiday music as I type. It's paired with my iTunes library on my PC. But most impressive is how it sounds in the vast outdoors paired with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else is comparrable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Truly a Blast from the past. Very little distortion, good volume and clear. Battery lasts for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bart

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This has been great speaker, sounds great and very tough
customer_reviews.author: housefly1

customer_reviews.title: Turcom Acousto Shock 30 Watt BTS Solid All Around Performer
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy & durable Speaker with a nice Pop Out Handle that has exceptionally long Battery Life with its 8,000 mAh Lithium Ion Battery. Good Sound, but Not Great. Decent Top Volume, but Not overly exceptional. Good All Around Outdoor Speaker
customer_reviews.author: Radio Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and good quality and volume, easy to use and connects quickly I'm very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work, camping, and fishing. I listen to classic rock and disco. Bass on it sounds great! Charge holds well. Very loud. Always have to turn it down when people are with me.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker

customer_reviews.title: Bass is great, bigger than I expected which is a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Bass is great, bigger than I expected which is a good thing! Seems very durable, the price is great for the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, nice handle
customer_reviews.text: This speaker delivers great sound even at the maximum volume level, which is loud enough to fill the back yard. It sounds great using a bluetooth or a wired connection. The pop-out handle is very convenient.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great portability. The quality of the build is also first rate.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and I love that I not only use it as a means to listen to my music, but I also use it as a conference system through my cell phone.

customer_reviews.title: Under promised but over delivered!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the price, I expected less but was pleasantly surprised by e quality of this speaker. I use it on my golf cart and it's terrific.

customer_reviews.title: Easy connection. No problems
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this speaker exceeds all expectations. Easy connection. No problems. Plenty of volume to be the only music playing at an outdoor party. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money / slick design

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and feel. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Solid rugged feel and well built. Loved everything about it. Only one problem, it would not shut off after sitting dormant for 10 min as advertised. I Returned it for a refund and ordered another one.

customer_reviews.title: bad ass little thing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing puts out big sound, considering its size! A bit heavy, but can really keep up with the music.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, use it outside and is effective ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, use it outside and is effective for about 60 ft to the front of the speakers. Buttons are very sensitive, but quickly got used to how to handle the unit without touching the buttons.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty loud. And surprising bass for a speaker this size.

customer_reviews.title: This speaker works awesome great sound super durable but if bake or loose ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works awesome great sound super durable but if bake or loose the charger its virtually impossible to find another one, not through the company or anywhere else, i did find something that mite work but it's twice the price then I payed for the speaker so trust me don't break the charger is called everywhere and everyone just tells me to buy a new one and use the charger for both and I think that's messed up
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 2yrs ago and its been abused but it still cranks it out!! no problems!!!

customer_reviews.text: Its a steal! I like it better than the bose and its louder than soundlink 3.

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: No stars if i could. I haven't even had this product for 6 months and it already won't turn on. Junk.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy just weak
customer_reviews.text: What a let down. Sounds muddy, dull just use you device speakers. (💩)Packing etc all great but the unit is a MUST PASS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is good for indoors but not good for outdoors, although it does have really good bass
customer_reviews.author: israel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a boat while fishing. Even with the 9.9 full blast this thing was still easily audible. Withstood water and pike blood. Definitely worth the money. It was a little bigger/heavier than I expected, so if you're looking for something very compact keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Good rugged Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: This tank-like Bluetooth thing is a good speaker. I would not call it great because it does not deliver the high volume that I thought 30W could. It is loud but I was surprised that my much smaller Monster HD micro Bluetooth seems to be just as loud. It does deliver on bass and was pleasantly surprised that my son came to my room complaining of the RUMBLING through the wall into his bedroom! I really do like that this rugged speaker is actually easily portable (handle!) and should be ready for rough handling and water splashes if those things should happen. Overall, I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paulitico

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great BT speaker for it's size. Good sound and volume. perfect for the patio or beach Update: I've had this speaker for over a year now and recently did something careless. I set it on the rear bumper of my car and forgot about it. I took off and was going 55 mph when it fell off on the road. I had the window open and heard it hit the ground and saw it bouncing and skidding in the rear view mirror. I thought it was destroyed. I turned it on and checked it out. The only damage was some cosmetic scuffs and scratches!!! Still works and sounds great! A testament to it's rugged design !!!
customer_reviews.author: AGK

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected and for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift since they wanted a more powerful Bluetooth speaker and this one fits the bill. Very rugged and the retractable handle works nice since this one is bigger than the little 10 watt unit we had in the past. It has a rubber ring to protect the corners and it sits on it's side nicely if you have only a small amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: SalR

customer_reviews.title: Loved this speaker right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Loved this speaker right out of the box,solid looked great,sound quality was all I could ask from a speaker this size,first problem was the speaker would shut itself off every 8-10 minutes,I guess to save batteries,looked it up on google and found that this problem would stop if unit was plugged into a power source at all times while in use?A bit inconvienent for a'portable' speaker but ok tried that and it worked,stayed on for a couple hours sounded great..next time I used it it kept shutting off WHILE plugged in and I discovered the speaker was no longer acknowledging the power source,sent it back still waiting for a refund,maybe I got a lemon,good luck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and Loud!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's big. It sounds great tho. This puts my previous bluetooth speaker to shame. It really rocks the house and seems rugged enough to take on bike rides, party style. This gets pretty darn loud and still sounds good. I highly recommend. As a PS, after fully charging the speaker it no longer would turn on. Now that my return has been processed, I'm going to buy it again and hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lucid Spark

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: The best quality and sound. Also when my phone rings, it does not go through the system. Others I have purchased have been extremely annoying when the phone rings and the entire conversation is heard through the speaker. We use it on the boat in Havasu and it's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its eh at best.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this speaker for a few weeks I think it's 2 or 3 now. I'm not very happy with the sound quality at all and not to mention if you like rap or hip hop don't bother buying this speaker it has no bass. If you go a tad above half way on volume it gets distorted.I want to return it but can't find a option for just not what I expected for what I payed. For the money go with a archeer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth no go
customer_reviews.text: Plays with included cable, but NOT wirelessly via bluetooth 4 (as described). Complained to Turcom. Their solution was to replace the speaker. 2nd one same problem. Error message wants speaker driver. Speaker does not come with a driver.
customer_reviews.author: CatMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Great rugged speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Well built (like a tank) Water and weather resistant Loud! 30Watts Long battery life + it doubles as a backup charger for your phone Bluetooth + line in Collapsible handle Cons: The sound has a light stadium effect to it. In other words, the music sounds a tiny bit echoey. This comes with the territory of being a small speaker pumping out a ton of sound When playing songs with heavy bass at 90% volume, if you don't have the speaker on a grippy surface it will walk Overall: The best 30 Watts speaker I tried!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!, Huge sound
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!, Huge sound, I did have a issue with the pop up handle after a while but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this speaker. It has excellent base and brings the iPhone to life. She uses it in her swimspa everytime. Best purchase ever.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: It was given to me as a Christmas present. All I can say is wow. it sounds great, looks fantastic. it does everything we could hope a Bluetooth speaker would do. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for normal conidtions
customer_reviews.text: RUGGED bluetooth speaker, I use it in an automotive shop for work, I've dropped it many times, scratched it, got oil on it and it still works good as new.Great battery life, rich depth of sound, i love the built in carrying handle ONLY COMPLAINT not nearly as loud as my other more powerful bluetooth speakers but works great for about a 30ft radius in regular conditions. In a shop there is constant air tools and engines going so the enviroment isnt very speaker friendly. device performed well. battery is great. if you are looking for a booming loud speaker this isnt it, ANY THING ELSE AND THIS IS YOUR SPEAKER
customer_reviews.author: Alex J

customer_reviews.title: ... year and the sound quality now has gotten really terrible. The bass has blown
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for over a year and the sound quality now has gotten really terrible. The bass has blown. If it's at 50% volume or higher the bass sounds staticy and busted. I don't understand why manufacturers make speakers that can blow themselves out. Odds are you'll want to listen to this on full volume a lot and odds are your bass will blow out.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: I get down with this speaker and everyone loves the sound.
customer_reviews.text: Nice . I have two friends that ordered it after seeing mine. Now the price is only 59.00 WOW I paid 89.00 and it was well worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Bass Heads are welcome
customer_reviews.text: this is a great speaker if you love music with bass, i also have the alpatronix 12w i feel as tho that one is Louder in volume this speaker out preforms it in the bass nice low fq. battery is massive and can last 2 plus days on mod use not a bad upgrade plus its water resistant

customer_reviews.text: No charger with the unit. Worked great. Minus the problem of the battery dying in an hour due to no charger.

product_meta.title: Turcom Acousto Shock 30 Watt Rugged Water Resistant Wireless Bluetooth Speake...
product_meta.description: Powerful and rugged speaker that can keep up with your active lifestyle. 30 Watt rated speaker with superb bass and crystal clear treble. Water-resistant (IP X5 rated) dust and dirt proof, shock-resistant design for outdoor use and abuse. Portable speaker let's you stream music wirelessly using Bluetooth-enabled devices, including smartphones, tablets, computers and MP3 players. Advanced Bluetooth 4.0 Technology, optimized version of Bluetooth that consumes less energy and delivers crystal clear sound. Pairs instantly with Bluetooth devices like smartphones, Tablets, and computers, letting you send your favorite songs wirelessly to the speaker. Change tracks and adjust volume from your Bluetooth device, or use the buttons located on the speaker. High-capacity chargeable battery allows 7 hours of play time. Use as a portable power supply to charge your phone or tablet with the USB out port. Specifications: - 2.2 CH with 30 Watt output - 2 x 2.75 inch diameter drivers - 2 x 3" by 2" subwoofer - 7 hours of continuous music with 8000 mAh rechargeable battery - Bluetooth 4.0 CSR chip - 33 feet wireless transmission range - A2DP, HFP, HSP, EDR features for high-quality sound - Retractable handle for easy carrying - Fast charging via AC adaptor (included) - Dimensions: 10" x 3.8" x 4.7" - Weight: 23 oz. Contents: - Bluetooth speaker - 1 x AC power adaptor - 1 x 3.5 mm AUX cable - 1 x USB cable - User Manual
feature_bullets: SOLID BUILD - Rubberized rugged exterior for impact resistance that can keep up with your active lifestyle. IPX5 Water-resistant, dust and dirt proof, shock-resistant design for outdoor use and abuse.

POWERFUL SOUND- 30 watt rated powerful speaker with superb bass and crystal clear treble. Equipped with a passive sub-woofer and 2x15 Watt 2.75 inch drivers delivering the rich bass and quality sound.
CONNECTION GURU - Stream music wirelessly using Bluetooth-enabled devices, including smartphones, tablets, computers and MP3 players. NFC enabled for quick connection with NFC compatible devices.

OUTDOOR ENTERTAINMENT - AcoustoShock is ideal for both the outdoors and indoors. With its water resistant, dust-proof, dirt-proof and shock-proof rating, listen to your music at the shower or camping.
LONG LASTING BATTERY - This speaker has a 8,000 mAh lithium ion rechargeable battery, allowing up to 7 hours of continuous music. The battery can also be used a portable power bank for your devices.
